name: Ironcliff Yards
culture_adjustments: pilot initiation rites are stricter and vocational
workplace rituals outrank formal temple schedules
higher contract literacy among yard masters
ancestor veneration integrated into launches and repairs
constraints: limited fresh water for heavy processes
harbor depth restricts very large hulls
clan labor obligations limit rapid scaling
notes: strategic state asset for fleets and reagent supply
seasonal slowdown during monsoon and heavy storms
pilot rites control yard access and contracts
